column4: sorry heheh... i have a buddy madsen who is up all night so i was just curious
can i leave irc on and do my distro upgrade?
how can i change my login manager ?
is there a GUI to change it?
let me try i kevix.. thanks
also, if you 'dpkg-reconfigure xdm' it will ask what you want to use.
well you have either vim or emacs. each has its own religion!
but ALL unix like systems have 'vi', so its always good to know.
I've always used vim. never had the patience to learn emacs.
when you say text editor--is that for editing any file or for creating reports--if so, use latex!
it takes a while, but no WP compares!
